summary: This package processes simulation results to compute child stunting prevalence across ages and parameter configurations, generates visualizations of the outcomes, and defines a default scenario that runs the stunting model together with health‑system, disease (diarrhoea, ALRI), and labour modules, enabling comprehensive undernutrition analysis.
business_intent: Equip researchers, program managers, and policymakers with analytical tools to assess and compare the effects of health and socioeconomic interventions on child stunting, supporting evidence‑based planning and resource allocation.
